roleset.name: make rustic?
roleset.note: RUSTICATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rusticate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, surprise surprise. (from rusticate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: I have no idea what this means
example.text: ``It took Zhao Ziyang (former premier and party chief) 10 years to build a team of economists who understood how the Western economies work and now [that team]-1 is part in exile, part being rusticated *trace*-1 and part missing.''
